bboxes.raw_text:
Thirty nine singers from Prairie View University
Of the best touring will present Rhapsdc Tel
Of Songs Internatonale'


Under the Edison aunus of Prairie View
who has his PHI D. music the choir has electrified the
from Texas to the Midwest and the Pacific States.


Compositions ranging from Bruckners "Te
folk songs will be presented.


The program will presented Longew auditorium
18th and E. Indian School Rd., March 4.

Weekly scrubbing and re-wax
ing is not always the best way T.
keep a busy kitchen floor clean
You may get better results b.
hopping the floor often - ever:
day or two, if necessary - with T.
mop wrung out of cool soap o.
detergent suds.


These quick sudsings, which
should not disturb the wax finish
will probably cut down on the
number of hard scrubbings ant
waxings your floor demands.

WASHINGTON = A Texas born
Negro lawyer Is on duty at the
Republican National Committee
to try to melt the "snow job"
she claims Democrats have been
giving Negroes and other MI
nority groups in an effort to win
and hold their votes.


Abertine Bowie, special as
sistant in the Women Division,
says her job Is to tell the truth
to Negro women in an effort to
organize them for the COP in
rhis years presidential cam
paign.


Republicans have done 90
many things for Negroes but
haven't capitalized on what they
have DONE" she said in aninter-
view.


THE Democrats have done q
snow Job on the Negro popula-
ton, but we haven't forcibly put
ourselves over to them"


Miss Bowie, who served as
Assistant Attorney General In
Illinois under the appointment Of
Republican Governor William G.
Stratton, plans to travel to urban
centers with heavy Negro popu-
ladons and tell them what the
Republicans have done for their
race from "Lincoln's day to the
present"


At the same time, She II try to
get Negro women to participate
more actively in politics and
community life.


She added that Negro women
have not assumed their full re-
sponsibility nor taken full advan-
tage of their opportunities and
I'VE have to get them interested
and bring them In


Miss Bowie, who was the sec
ond Negro woman to be graduated
from the University Of Texas law
school, expects to concentrate
her efforts in Illinois, Ohio, New
York, California and "any other
areas where I'm invited" she
said.


Already, she has established
a Republican Club for Negro
women in Houston that has 80
members.


She began her political activity
In Chicago. She was on the Chi
cage staff Of the 1860 Republican
Presidential candidate, Richard
M, Nixon.

COP AIDE TO


END SNOW JOB

full articles.headline:
HOUSEHOLD HINT
FOR FLOORS
full articles.article:
Weekly scrubbing and re-wax
ing is not always the best way T.
keep a busy kitchen floor clean
You may get better results b.
hopping the floor often - ever:
day or two, if necessary - with T.
mop wrung out of cool soap o.
detergent suds.


These quick sudsings, which
should not disturb the wax finish
will probably cut down on the
number of hard scrubbings ant
waxings your floor demands.
